title: Value should not be adorned, But venerated
subtitle: Gateway to a New NFT Project
AboutText:
Valoria Sanctum is an NFT art project that merges the majesty of classical art with a mysterious, high-end aesthetic. Your held NFT art comes to life within the virtual metropolis created by Valoria Sanctum, <l>"Valoria City."</l> It serves to exhibit and assert your ownership of the art, and its existential value is elevated from merely a "decoration" to a "symbol to be worshipped."
Obtain art, born from a sacred creation forge and filled with mystery and dignity, now.

Roadmaps.text2: Release the first set of NFTs and introduce them to collectors.
Open the beta version of Valoria City for early exploration and testing.
Start trading and selling virtual land and assets within the metaverse.
Open Valoria City to all users with full features available.Digital art will become available for purchase as physical paintings.
As Valoria Sanctum evolves and demand grows, early participants receive exclusive benefits and rewards.

BrandDescription: Valoria Sanctum's NFT collection <l>(The Valoria Canvases)</l> allows you to exhibit the art in the metaverse <lc>(ValoriaCity)</lc> by holding it, and gives you proof that you can obtain it as a "real-life painting."
TVCAboutText:
Presented by Valoria Sanctum, The Valoria Canvases is not just digital art. Born from the Sacred Workshop, each piece carries a unique aura of mystery and majesty, granting its owner a distinct status in the world of collectors.

Every NFT is verified on the blockchain as a one-of-a-kind masterpiece, embedding eternal value in your collection. Limited minting — only a few remain. Don’t miss your chance to claim your own symbol of Valoria today.
TVCAboutTitle2: Why You Should Join This NFT Project Right Now
TVCAboutText2:
This is the moment when early supporters shape the future of the entire project.
By joining now, you’re not just purchasing an NFT — you’re securing a privileged position at the foundation of a world that will continue to grow.
TVCAboutTitle3: Phase 5: Major Returns for Early Participants
TVCAboutText3: expands and general demand grows, early participants will be granted special perks that will never be offered again, enhanced rewards, exclusive virtual areas accessible only to early joiners, and dominant advantages. As the project evolves, your initial contribution will be recognized and rewarded.
TVCAboutText4: Be part of the origin. Claim the advantages reserved only for those who step in before the rest of the world arrives.
TVCAboutText5: Now is the time. Don’t miss the moment before the gates close.
vcsubtitle: The exalted virtual city where your NFTs live and thrive.
vctext:
ValoriaCity is the virtual metropolis where the NFT collection “The Valoria Canvases” truly comes to life.
Landowners can freely build structures, curate NFT art galleries, and elevate their creations from simple displays to revered symbols within a sacred digital realm.
Phase1text:
Raising the sacred capital required to forge the core structure of Valoria City.
Those who join at this stage are recognized as the First Founders.
Phase2text:
Commencing the development of Valoria City, its NFT mechanisms, and the virtual land systems.
The architecture of the divine metaverse begins to take shape.
Phase3text:
Releasing the Beta version of Valoria City to selected early participants.
Exploration, testing, and early-world adaptation begin.
Phase4text:
Full public release of Valoria City.
NFT owners gain complete access to land, housing, galleries, and social interaction features.
teo: The evolution of Valoria Sanctum continues.
Current Stage sub2: Forging the primordial capital that ignites the creation of Valoria City.
Current Stage sub3: Early supporters of this phase earn the eternal title of
Current Stage sub4:
, recorded permanently on-chain.
Your contribution becomes part of the city’s immutable history, shaping the world that follows.
Metaverse Preview2: ※ This section is an area for displaying images of the metaverse development stage.
→ R: → Renders the futuristic city in real-time, accessible across PC, mobile, and VR environments.
→ D: → Display your NFTs within the city, placing them on land or in galleries.
Avatar: Avatar movement, building manipulation, and viewing exhibits
→ S: → Showcase and interact with NFTs inside the 3D space.
→ Sm: → Smooth operation in large cities using LOD and batch rendering.
Q1: Q1: What is the future potential of Valoria Sanctum?
Q1text:
Valoria Sanctum is designed to grow beyond just an NFT collection. 
As Valoria City expands, users will be able to trade virtual land, showcase their collections, and participate in events. 
The project's roadmap ensures continuous development, offering both cultural and investment value.
Q2text:
Valoria Sanctum is a premium NFT art project blending classical art grandeur with a mystical aesthetic. 
Your NFTs live in the virtual city, Valoria City, as symbols to be revered.
Q3: Q3: How can I buy the NFTs?
Q3text:
NFTs will be available on OpenSea and other partnered marketplaces during the launch period. 
Make sure to connect your compatible crypto wallet to participate.
Q4text:
Valoria City is the virtual metaverse world created by Valoria Sanctum where your NFTs exist and gain value. 
You can explore, interact, and showcase your collection.
Q5: Q5: Can I trade or sell my NFTs?
Q5text:
Yes, all NFTs can be traded on secondary marketplaces. 
Each NFT retains its unique rarity and mystical attributes, enhancing its value.
Q6: Q6: Is there a roadmap for the project?
Q6text: Yes! Valoria Sanctum has a roadmap that includes the NFT launch, metaverse beta release, virtual land marketplace, and full public release.
